name: Cop and Robbers - Free
description:
This game is designed for kids.

Simple point and click game, right? Save the day by catching the thieves who run amok in the city. Keep the crime at a low level. But those fast thieves are not so easy to catch when it gets dark. Climb your way up the leaderboard and become the world's best cop.

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

How to Play?
Press the robber to catch him. Sounds easy, right?
